messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.exp/

LGTM for now, but please think about the zero property

https://codereview.appspot.com/9298044/diff/2001/locale/locale.go
File locale/locale.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/9298044/diff/2001/locale/locale.go#newcode29
locale/locale.go:29: und   = ID{lang: unknownLang, region: unknownRegion, script: unknownScript}
can it be arranged that these are zero, so the fields default to unknown?

https://codereview.appspot.com/9298044/diff/2001/locale/locale.go
File locale/locale.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/9298044/diff/2001/locale/locale.go#newcode29
locale/locale.go:29: und   = ID{lang: unknownLang, region: unknownRegion, script: unknownScript}
On 2013/05/08 16:10:45, r wrote:
> can it be arranged that these are zero, so the fields default to unknown?
Yes.  This is on my TODO, but not high priority at this moment.  It is somewhat tricky.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=4da2cb5e2a51&repo=exp ***

go.exp/locale: fix default values.

R=r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/9298044

subject: code review 9298044: go.exp/locale: fix default values.
